page.title: 19CLUTTON SCHOOL DIARY
page.content: This Summer term has been very busy. {May Day} We had a May King and Queen. Classes 1 and 2 sang songs and danced around the Maypole, Classes 3 and 4 read poems that they had written in celebration and some of class 5 acted a mummer's play. {Sports Day} We had events such as the hat, the hoop,the sack, the potato, the skipping and the 3legged races. We also had flat races for the mums and dads. At the end Lancaster won by 171 points to Yorks 142 points. {Music Concerts On 10th July we had the Isaac Cup competition.Children played various pieces to see who had made the most progress. On 12th July we had a concert for parents where soloists, the orchestra and choir performed.
